headline: Robinhood, Coinbase Could Benefit From New Digital Asset Regulation, Says Bernstein
summary: A new digital assets regulatory framework could significantly expand the offerings of Robinhood (NASDAQ:HOOD) and Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN), enabling both platforms to list a broader range of crypto assets and tokenized equities, according to a new ...

headline: Prediction: This Will Be the Best Cryptocurrency Investment of 2025
summary: At a time when many cryptocurrencies are losing value, the single best crypto investment opportunity of 2025 could turn out to be stablecoins.  What is a stablecoin?  The easiest way to think about stablecoins is that they are digital dollars.
